description.plain:
Bankroll Fresh, formerly Yung Fresh, blew up after his tribute to the Hot Boys earned a remix with Lil Wayne.

With three mixtapes under his belt, Bankroll had yet to release his debut album when he was tragically gunned down in Atlanta on March 4th, 2016. He was 28.

body.plain:

songs.lyrics:
56 ContributorsWalked In Lyrics[Intro: Bankroll Fresh]
Street
Yeah, I'm back
(2-17 on the track, man)
(Yeah, yeah)

[Chorus: Bankroll Fresh]

Nigga came from dope-dealing

Come up in the street, I'm peeling (Skrr)
Come up in the street, I'm peeling

And I might just lose the ceiling
And I'm trying to grind up on a million
And I might kill it if feel it
Hell yeah
Yeah, damn right I kill it if she give it
MAC got extension
Take it and we flip it
Take it and remix it
Bring it back, Sixteen Curry on them hoes
Bank too big, need pockets like Girbaud

I hit hard like, "Shawty, you lit"
Fuck all you rappers, my trap look like Casper

Ask all those strippers, I stay with that cash
I'm in a dipper, I'm moving them bags
Play with that money we put on a mask
Knew no limit, we bustin' your ass

Come up in the street, I'm peeling (Skrr)

songs.title: Hot Boy

description.plain: Bankroll Fresh pays homage to the Hot Boys of the late ‘90s and early '00s with his hit “Hot Boy” in which he directly references the group’s members and their affiliates.

20 ContributorsHot Boy Lyrics[Intro: Bankroll Fresh & Cassius Jay]
That boy Cassius
Yeah, Fresh
